medium: Silk, wool, cotton; needle chain stitch, slanted buttonhole stitch, cretan stitch
title: At torba ilgich
description: Cloth band, Pieced, printed lining. Red wool round with polychrome silk embroidery, cotton edge binding and printed cotton backing. Square center design and four corner images. Pieced, red print lining. Chain stitch dominates.
creditline: Gift of Jack A. and Aviva Robinson
